channel.title: How to add shops
channel.description:
hey guys im having problems with adding servers so far i got this
shop = 45 Elite Shop 2 2 3749 100 3751 100 3753 100 3755 100 1093 100 1127 100 1163 100 1201 100 1187 100 4153 100 952 100
i found this in the source i was using. how do i set this shop so an npc gets the item in it.

item.title: How to add shops
item.dc:creator: @Jammydee Jammydee
item.description:
@Jammydee wrote:

You’re welcome

Read full topic

item.title: How to add shops
item.dc:creator: @expozee expozee
item.description:
@expozee wrote:

[quote=“Jammydee, post:3, topic:376730”]What do you mean…

if you mean how do you make it so that the shop opens when you talk to an npc in client.java find - faceNPC(NPCSlot);
after the } add this:

if(NPCID == ####){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = XX;
}

= the shopkeepers id

XX == the shop id

also a few lines below you’ll find second click npc copy and paste what you’ve just added into that bit as well, cause i’m never quite sure which one does it ;)[/quote]
this is just what i needed thanks, i could figure out why i couldnt set it now i got it

Read full topic

item.title: How to add shops
item.dc:creator: @Jammydee Jammydee
item.description:
@Jammydee wrote:

What do you mean…

if you mean how do you make it so that the shop opens when you talk to an npc in client.java find - faceNPC(NPCSlot);
after the } add this:

if(NPCID == ####){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = XX;
}

= the shopkeepers id

XX == the shop id

also a few lines below you’ll find second click npc copy and paste what you’ve just added into that bit as well, cause i’m never quite sure which one does it

Read full topic
